reviews.review: good game arguably better than csgo
great remake of cs 1.6 with modern graphics and still under 5gb download!

I have not played this game a lot. 3 Hours at review time. However, this game has been extremely fun so far, and I haven't even played real people as of yet. I originally got this game so I could get textures for GMOD, and played about 13 minutes of this. I came back 4 or 5 months later and decided "Hey, lets see how fun this game is". I created a server and decide to play against the bots. Surprisingly, the bots were very fun to play against and with. The community could be toxic but IDK yet. I am willing to try out community maps but they could be a bust. A fun shooter so far and much worth buying just for the singleplayer against the bots. Sorry if you were seeing how this game is multiplayer, but I am willing to edit this review later on for the multiplayer. Thank you very much Valve for such an exciting, well crafted game and AI!

Эта игра похожа на CS:GO только без скинов и более ярче. На данный момент, она сейчас не такая популярная как CS 1.6 и CS:GO. Мне в этой игре нравиться как обычный режим, так и Zombe Escape. Жаль, что Jail Mod умер. Попробуем восстановить игру с колен.
